job.title: Software Engineer, CDA
job.description: ltstronggtjob purposeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcda is searching for an experienced software engineer to help our transition to a cloudbased it ecosystem we are aggressively moving from older siloed onpremises solutions to azure and aws hosted systems that integrate with each other in real timeltbrgtltbrgtthis position will be responsible for applying software development skills and methodology to fill gaps in our overall solution portfolio rather than performing extensive ground up development of systems our efforts will center on creatively integrating disconnected systems while filling in functional gaps as neededltbrgtltbrgtltugtexamples of work that our software engineer may doltbrgtltugtltulgtltligtwriting azure functions to handle azure eventhub eventsltligtltligtwriting azure bc custom policiesltligtltligtdevelopment of automated employee onboarding and offboarding including and o and zoom license provisioning and recoveryltbrgtltligtltulgtthe primary development languages used at cda are c java powershell and bash however our software engineer should be comfortable with leaning on a solid understanding of core web technologies like html css javascript http xml and json to adapt their solution approach given a variety of runtime environments and componentsltbrgtltbrgtthe software engineer analyzes designs develops modifies writes edits and implements software programming applications the primary responsibility of the position will be to execute on the design development and delivery of technology that enables great customer experiences that deliver on desired functionality on behalf of the organization this will include developing production grade code through vision definition planning execution deployment and sustainment as well as performing unit testing to ensure conformance to specificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtessential competenciesltbrgtltugtltulgtltligtrelationship skills collaborationltligtltligtadaptation skills innovation facilitationltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtessential functions must be able to perform with or without a reasonable accommodationltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtactive contributor to an agile team tasked with integrating siloed corporate applications and driving efficiency supportability and maturity into the enterprise ecosystemltligtltligtdevelop and execute production grade code through definition planning execution deployment and sustainmentltligtltligtproactively communicate and work to mitigate changes to project timelines degradation in performance of applications and concerns with project andor product directionltligtltligtensure assigned tasks are prioritized and executed within deadlinesltligtltligtability to break up larger projects into individual pieces and assess complexity of each piece for developmentltligtltligthelp to establish consistency reliability supportability and monitoring across our servicesltligtltligtparticipates in the development and delivery of client solutions by participating in the effort of estimating planning designing implementing and testing custom software applicationsltligtltligtleverage internally available tools and communicate with other internal development ampamp product teamsltligtltligtinfluence the organization via quality standards to enhance the technical design development deployment and maintenance of the productltligtltligtwork with it leadership to identify and implement new technologies and techniques that can improve our overall platform performance and ultimate customer experienceltligtltligtassist in technical audits and make sure to implement audit recommendationsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtnonessential functionsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtfamiliar with analyzing and defining software requirements to determine specifications and standardsltligtltligtassist in the testing and creating of automated tests for new development ensuring every function service and object is compatible with the teams work and with the many systems within the system portfolioltligtltligtperforms other duties as assignedltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtrequired education licenses ampamp experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelors degree in technologyrelated field or equivalent experienceltligtltligta minimum of years of relevant software development experienceltligtltligtfamiliar with software design ampamp architectureltligtltligtfamiliar with all software layers including ui service data store and communication layersltligtltligtfamiliar with working with servicebased application architectures and familiar with various api protocolsltligtltligtorganized and detailoriented with ability to manage time effectivelyltligtltligtrelationship skills collaboration participating as an active contributive and supportive member of a team to achieve shared goals listening sharing and trustingltligtltligtadaptation skills innovation using creativity ingenuity and insight to tackle issues proactively addressing problems and seeking fresh solutionsltligtltligtadaptation skills facilitation contributing to an environment that promotes and enables change pursuing new and better ways of workingltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtpreferred education licenses ampamp experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtat least years experience in a technical lead roleltligtltligtskilled with core web technologies html css javascript rest apis xml jsonltligtltligtskilled with multiple programming and scripting languages and tools primarily c or java powershell and bash likely some jqueryltligtltligtfamiliar with internet protocols and security patterns eg http tls oauth saml open id connectltligtltligtfamiliar with relational database technology ms sql server in particularltligtltligtfamiliar with the docker containers and images dockerfiles build run connectltligtltligtfamiliar with aws andor azure cloud hosting platformsltligtltligtstrong communication skills with demonstrated ability to explain complex technical issues to both technical and nontechnical audiencesltligtltligtrelevant industry as applicable insurance supply nonprofit membership experienceltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtworking conditionsltstronggt occasionally frequently constantly ltbrgtltulgtltligtconstantly sitting and working on a computerltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtwe are cdaltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtover our year history the california dental association cda has become a leader in oral health throughout california and the country today we continue to support our community of over dentists through our family of companies which include the dentists insurance company tdic tdic insurance solutions rotunda partners and the cda foundation at cda we value individual talents encouraging a diverse collaborative and innovative work environment fueled by new ideas as our organization continues to grow we invite you to be a part of whats nextltbrgtltbrgtcda is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and providing a safe work environment cda does not tolerate discrimination or harassment and all employment decisions are based on job requirements and individual qualifications without regard to race color religion national origin age gender gender identity or expression sex ancestry citizenship status mental or physical disability genetic information sexual orientation veteran or military status if you have a disability or special need
